A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
(If i could rate it 0 stars i would)

What the hell happened to this movie?! It's like Rian Johnson didn't even bother watching The Force Awakens to see all the story arcs that JJ Abrams left open to be continued in The Last Jedi.

Knights of Ren - thrown out the window
Rey's parents - dismissed as some low beat junkers (after 2 years of build up)
Kylo's obsession with vader because he wants to be as great a sith as he was- Completely dropped
The map Luke left with the resistance in case they needed him again - He basically tells Rey to fuck off (then why did he leave a map that told them how to find him?)
Phasma's "return" - Absolutely pointless\, she only has 10mins screen time and then dies AGAIN
Forced humour crammed into the movie at the most pointless of times.

The list of faults in this film just goes on and on. It's so full of shallow plot points and 0 character development (Rose falling in love with Finn in the span of 12hrs? wtf?!). It's like Rian Johnson wanted to rewrite all the character development that was set up by JJ Abrams in The Force Awakens.

If you want to watch this as just a SCI-FI movie with no knowledge of the pervious star wars materials\, yeah it's an "ok" film......at best.

If you want to watch this as a STAR WARS film\, then you will be extremely disappointed.

If you want to know more of the films faults and plounders check out Angry Joe's "Top 10 reasons the last jedi made me angry" video. Angry Joe may not be for everyone\, but all his points are spot on as to why this film is a piece of shit and disgraced the star wars franchise.
